thread.title: After he gave away pizza to a homeless man, Mookie Betts hit two home runs
thread.title_full: After he gave away pizza to a homeless man, Mookie Betts hit two home runs

title: After he gave away pizza to a homeless man, Mookie Betts hit two home runs
text: Boston.com Staff | 10.01.15 | 11:29 AM Pizza is the gift that keeps on giving. When Red Sox catcher Blake Swihart had leftover pizza, he gave it away to a homeless man . He hit two home runs the next day. So when Mookie Betts and Swihart found themselves with extra slices on Tuesday, Swihart told Betts to do the same. On Wednesday night, Betts also hit two home runs. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below “I’ve never hit one that far,” the young player told WEEI’s Full Count blog. His two home runs in the seventh and 11th innings helped the Sox beat the New York Yankees with a 9-5 win. It’s a theory, but pizza and good deeds go a long way, and the Sox should keep that in mind. Watch the video below: — Zack Cox (@ZackCoxNESN) October 1, 2015 Contact Ashli at ashli.molina@boston.com . Follow her on Twitter @MolinaAshli Most Popular
